pullRequest.title: APPSERV-18 Test for testing get application name
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
This PR adds unit tests for this PR: #4384
Testing Environment
Zulu JDK 1.8_222 on Elementary OS 0.4.1 Loki with Maven 3.5.4>

commit.message: APPSERV-18 Test for testing get application name

nodes.bodyText: I feel like a assertSomething helper method should be extended and used by each of the 3 test methods which should make them more readable in the the way: this input has that expected output. It should also become clear why only this test needs mockup of the readableArchive.getName().

commit.message:
Response to the reviews:
* Added a utility method to make the code cleaner and more readable
* Added comments to explain what methods does
* Added test to test when the user doesn't provide an application name
